q_1.question: What is BlockLang?
q_1.answer: BlockLang is a comprehensive browser extension with two powerful features: search result filtering and Scam Shield security protection. Filter unwanted content from search results and stay protected from scams, phishing, and malicious websites in real-time.

q_2.question: Is BlockLang safe and private?
q_2.answer: Yes, BlockLang is completely private and secure. All filtering happens locally on your device - no data is sent to external servers. Your browsing habits, search queries, and filter preferences never leave your device.

q_3.question: Which browsers support BlockLang?
q_3.answer:
BlockLang is available for:
  • Chrome - Available on Chrome Web Store
  • Firefox - Available on Firefox Add-ons
  • Safari - Available on Apple AppStore

q_4.question: Is BlockLang free?
q_4.answer:
BlockLang pricing varies by platform:
  • Chrome & Firefox - Completely free with all features
  • Safari (iOS/macOS) - Free version (5 domain filters) + Pro version (unlimited filters)

The Chrome and Firefox versions have no limitations, while Safari offers both free and premium tiers.

q_5.question: How do I set up filters?
q_5.answer:
Setting up filters is simple:
  1. Click the BlockLang extension icon in your browser
  2. Add domains you want to block (e.g., facebook.com)
  3. Use wildcards for broader filtering (e.g., *.ru)
  4. Add language filters (e.g., language:ru)
  5. Toggle the Quick Russian Filter for instant blocking

Your filters will immediately start working on Google and Bing searches.

q_6.question: What happens if I want to leave?
q_6.answer: You can uninstall BlockLang at any time through your browser's extension settings. All your data is stored locally, so uninstalling will completely remove all traces of the extension from your system.

q_7.question: Are there any hidden fees?
q_7.answer: No, there are no hidden fees. The free version is completely free with 5 domain filters. The Pro version is a one-time purchase with no recurring fees or subscriptions.

q_8.question: Does BlockLang work on mobile devices?
q_8.answer: Yes, BlockLang is available for Safari on iOS (iPhone and iPad) through the App Store. The mobile version has the same features as the desktop version.

q_9.question: What is Scam Shield?
q_9.answer: Scam Shield is BlockLang's real-time security protection feature that warns you about dangerous websites. It provides instant 0-100% trust scoring and color-coded warnings for scams, phishing, and malware sites.

q_10.question: How does Scam Shield protect my privacy?
q_10.answer: Scam Shield only sends domain names (like example.com) to our security API - never personal data, full URLs, or browsing history. All security checks are anonymized and processed instantly without storing any user information.

q_11.question: Is Scam Shield free?
q_11.answer: Free users get 5 automatic security checks per day plus unlimited manual checks. Pro users get unlimited automatic checks and advanced security features like domain snoozing and granular warning controls.

q_12.question: How accurate is Scam Shield?
q_12.answer: Scam Shield uses advanced threat intelligence to provide 0-100% trust scoring. Sites with scores below 40% are flagged as dangerous, 40-69% as risky, and 70%+ as safe. The system has high accuracy with minimal false positives.
